questions.question: An object is taken from the earth to a planet where the value ‘g’ is 20 m/s^2. If it is compared with the value of ‘g’ on earth, which of the following statements is true?
questions.correct_answer: (a)weight on the planet will be greater

(b)weight on the planet will be the same
(c)mass on the planet will be greater
(d)mass on the planet will be smaller
